A

ambusher - Variable in class ghost.App
 
Ambusher - Class in ghost.objects
One type of ghost, that targets 4 steps ahead of the player based on its current direction, and the top right corner in Scatter mode.
Ambusher(int, int, PImage, int) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Ambusher
Ambusher constructor, calls the super contructor to intiialize the current position, image and movement speed.
App - Class in ghost
 
App() - Constructor for class ghost.App

changeDirection(Moving.Direction) - Method in class ghost.objects.Moving
Change the direction of the moving object.
chaser - Variable in class ghost.App
 
Chaser - Class in ghost.objects
One type of ghost, that targets the player's current position in Chase Mode, and the top left corner in Scatter mode.
Chaser(int, int, PImage, int) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Chaser
Ambusher constructor, calls the super contructor to intiialize the current position, image and movement speed.
chaseTimer - Variable in class ghost.objects.Ghost
The counter to track how much time has passed in chase mode.
checkCurrentPosition() - Method in class ghost.objects.Waka
Checks current position of the player, to see if it is on a fruit or super fruit, which has not been eaten yet.
collide(Ghost) - Method in class ghost.objects.Waka
Check if the player collided against the ghost.
convertToObjects(PApplet) - Method in class ghost.objects.GameMap
Read the characters from gameMapMatrix, and set the tileMap, tiles and allTiles fields.
currentModeLength - Static variable in class ghost.objects.GameMap
The current length of the mode in seconds.

die() - Method in class ghost.objects.Waka
If the ghost is not frightened, decrease the number of lives by 1.

draw(PApplet) - Method in class ghost.objects.GameMap

ghost - package ghost
 
Ghost - Class in ghost.objects
The ghost class is a moving object, and unlike the player, moves on its own.
Ghost(int, int, PImage, int) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Ghost
The Ghost constructor, calls the super constructor to set the current position, and the image.
Ghost.Mode - Enum in ghost.objects
The current mode of the ghosts.
ghost.objects - package ghost.objects
 
ghosts - Static variable in class ghost.objects.GameMap
The list of all ghosts.

HEIGHT - Static variable in class ghost.App
 
home - Variable in class ghost.objects.Ghost
The point where the ghost starts when the game starts

I

ignorant - Variable in class ghost.App
 
Ignorant - Class in ghost.objects
One type of ghost, that targets the player only when it is more than 8 steps away from the player, else targets the bottom left corner.
Ignorant(int, int, PImage, int) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Ignorant
Ignorant constructor, calls the super contructor to intiialize the current position, image and movement speed.

Image of the moving object.
image - Variable in class ghost.objects.Tile
The image of the Tile

The index used for setting the mode and its mode length.

Check if the ghost was killed by the player in frightened mode.
isEaten - Variable in class ghost.objects.Tile
This is specifically for the Fruit and SuperFruit class.

Moving - Class in ghost.objects
Moving represents all of the objects that will be moving, namely, Waka and the ghosts
Moving(int, int, PImage) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Moving
Moving constructor, sets the x and y coordinates and the image.
Moving.Direction - Enum in ghost.objects

R

recentIntersection - Variable in class ghost.objects.Ghost
Tracks the current intersection, calculates the tile where it is closest to its current target and changes direction accordingly.
reset() - Method in class ghost.objects.Ghost
Reset the position of the ghosts if they are killed, and the player has been killed by another ghost.

Tile - Class in ghost.objects
All static objects, that is, Walls, Fruits and SuperFruit shall extend from the Tile class.
Tile(int, int, PImage) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Tile
The constructor for the Tile, takes in the x and y coordinates, and a PImage object to draw on screen.

The int representation of the map.
tiles - Static variable in class ghost.objects.GameMap

The timer for the game.

W

Waka - Class in ghost.objects
The player class, and it extends Moving.
Waka(int, int, PImage, int, int) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Waka
The Waka contructor, calls the super constructor to set the position and image.
Wall - Class in ghost.objects
The Wall is a static object, and so it is a Tile.
Wall(int, int, PImage) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Wall
Wall constructor, calls the Tile constructor to initialize all the fields.
whim - Variable in class ghost.App
 
Whim - Class in ghost.objects
One type of ghost, that targets double the vector from Chaser to 2 grid spaces ahead of the player, and retreats to the bottom right corner in Scatter mode.
Whim(int, int, PImage, int) - Constructor for class ghost.objects.Whim
Whim constructor, calls the super contructor to intiialize the current position, image and movement speed.
WIDTH - Static variable in class ghost.App
